eventName: Ideal City: Carnival in the Endless Summer
storyInfo: Led by the architect Stitch, Tomimi and company head to the underground city of Zeruertza and witness a Durin water slide. Meanwhile, Gavial and Eunectes are searching for their own way underground.

attributes.content: That was a real close one, kiddo. You completely forgot the way here, didn't you?
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: I'm not a kid!
attributes.name: Stitch Canvas

attributes.content: And I'm, uh, just not a hundred-percent certain...
attributes.name: Stitch Canvas

attributes.content: Without a professional guide like me leading the way, how would a kiddo like you have made it through such a dangerous cave? Even I had to think twice before jumping in.
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: In any case, why don't we take this opportunity to set up camp and get some shut-eye? If you don't know how to pitch a tent, I can help out.
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: You serious? Is this really the time for that?
attributes.name: Inam

attributes.content: The air flows smoothly here, the area is spacious but sheltered from wind and rain, the temperature is pretty agreeable, and it's dark enough to skip the eye mask.
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: Um... I think Elysium raises some good points! But I'm not too familiar with these field tents...
attributes.name: Tomimi

attributes.content: No problemo, I'll show you what to do. This model's very simpleâ€” just unfold it and it's pretty much good to go. Just need to secure a few locks...
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: Woah, you're right! Very convenient!
attributes.name: Tomimi

attributes.content: When Logistics originally designed this model, they specifically consulted ME, the fieldwork specialist that I am!
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: I even graciously agreed to let them name the series after me, but I'm not sure why they didn't go through with it.
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: Well, maybe they felt there was still room for improvement, and that this tent model wasn't worthy of my name? What a shame. They should know I wouldn't nitpick over such minor things!
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: Tomimi, I've been hearing a lot about what a good time you've had at Rhodes Island, and that's all well and good, but I have to admit, I'm having second thoughts...
attributes.name: Inam

attributes.content: Do Rhodes Islanders always pitch tents inside lifts?
attributes.name: Inam

attributes.content: Um, I think Elysium is an exception...
attributes.name: Tomimi

attributes.content: I'll say it one more timeâ€” this isn't any regular old lift! This is the pride and joy of the Durin people, the Super Convenient Lift-o-Matic #1!
attributes.name: Stitch Canvas

attributes.content: Yes, indeedy. Makes for a great campsite.
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: Hey!
attributes.name: Stitch Canvas

attributes.content: Enough of that, you two. How long will it take to get to the underground city you're talking about?
attributes.name: Inam

attributes.content: Yeah, what's up with that, kiddo? We've been sitting in this lift for almost half an hour already.
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: It's not like I'm... *sigh*... I can't help but wonder, were you mixed up in all those stories I heard about Gavial back at the tribe?
attributes.name: Stitch Canvas

attributes.content: Of course! Too often am I on the receiving end of that woman's fists!
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: ...I think it might be better if you turned back.
attributes.name: Stitch Canvas

attributes.content: Well, it's not THAT often, but once every three weeks wouldn't be an exaggeration...
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: Wait! Elysium might just be one of Gavial's regular coworkers, but...
attributes.name: Tomimi

attributes.content: I am Gavial's most cherished partner, the leader of Acahualla's mightiest tribe, 'Gavial's Will!'
attributes.name: Tomimi

attributes.content: There's almost nothing true about that second half.
attributes.name: Inam

attributes.content: Haha... I appreciate your generosity and selfless help. I'm sure the city will welcome you with open arms.
attributes.name: Stitch Canvas

attributes.content: (mutters) Hopefully your ugly-ass metal monsters-on-treads will come in handy...
attributes.name: Stitch Canvas

attributes.content: Did you say something, Stitch?
attributes.name: Inam

attributes.content: Oh, not at all, I was just saying we're almost there.
attributes.name: Stitch Canvas

attributes.content: Ladies and gentlemen, welcome to Zeruertza.
attributes.name: Stitch Canvas

attributes.content: It's extremely rare for any surface-dweller to get to lay eyes on a Durin city, let alone our beautifulâ€“â€“
attributes.name: Stitch Canvas

attributes.content: Hey, hey, hey! What the heck is THAT?!
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: A giant waterfall?
attributes.name: Inam

attributes.content: It's... a huge water slide!!
attributes.name: Tomimi

attributes.content: No, that's not what's important. Can't you pay some respect to that beautiful, minimalistic place in the distance with a garden...
attributes.name: Stitch Canvas

attributes.content: So this is a Durin city? I thought it would be a bit more, uh... normal?
attributes.name: Inam

attributes.content: Mysterious underground palaces and whatnot. That's what the magazines always talk about.
attributes.name: Inam

attributes.content: Actually, Zeruertza is rather unique among Durin cities, because it was built by the legendary designer standing before you.
attributes.name: Stitch Canvas

attributes.content: My predecessors came here with the vision to create a city of beauty and harmony, and this magnificence is the product of their philosophy! And minimalism! It's...
attributes.name: Stitch Canvas

attributes.content: Super Spinner Slide!!!
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: Dylan wouldn't stop going on about how much fun Acahualla was, and I didn't believe him at first, with that wicked grin on his face, but it turned out to be true!
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: Ooh, ooh! I wanna see, I wanna see! We have to bring Gavial next time!
attributes.name: Tomimi

attributes.content: I wonder if the legendary Durins are interested in doing business.
attributes.name: Inam

attributes.content: Is there not a single shred of appreciation for minimalism in those empty heads of yours?! What is that heap of junk in front of you to the greatness of my work?!
attributes.name: Stitch Canvas

attributes.content: Well, whatever... I shouldn't have gotten my hopes up for you people.
attributes.name: Stitch Canvas

attributes.content: Huh, it should be somewhere around here.
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: Some elders in the tribe mentioned a giant cave beneath Acahualla, but I didn't expect it to be this complex.
attributes.name: Eunectes

attributes.content: Seems like what Tomimi and the others were saying turned out to be true.
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: If the worst case scenario comes to pass, it won't just be us Tiacauh that are affected. Everyone in this entire region's going to be at risk.
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: There's no way it's that serious.
attributes.name: High Priest

attributes.content: High Priest! What are you doing here?
attributes.name: Eunectes

attributes.content: Naturally, I came because I sensed the two of you in need of help. I am the all-knowing High Priest after all.
attributes.name: High Priest

attributes.content: So, old man, how are we supposed to get inside that legendary underground city?
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: Don't be in such a rush, children. It's not every day you get to delve deep into an underground cave. Soak in your surroundings.
attributes.name: High Priest

attributes.content: Take a look at these fluorescent plants. I'll let you in on a little secretâ€” if you grind them into powder and sprinkle them over grilled fin, the flavor simply speaks for itself.
attributes.name: High Priest

attributes.content: And look at these tiny little fruits on the vines...
attributes.name: High Priest

attributes.content: Sorry, but we're a bit short on time here!
attributes.name: Eunectes

attributes.content: Alright, I know. Do you remember the safe route coming here? If I recall correctly, it's left, right, then another right, then another left?
attributes.name: High Priest

attributes.content: And then four left turns in a row after that?
attributes.name: High Priest

attributes.content: That would take us right back where we started.
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: Really? Strange.
attributes.name: High Priest

attributes.content: Let me see if I can pull something else from memory... Ugh, these underground passages wind to and fro. It's hard to keep things straight! Was it right, and then uphill? Or was it downhill?
attributes.name: High Priest

attributes.content: How about the more dangerous path?
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: You're just as impetuous as when you were little.
attributes.name: High Priest

attributes.content: There does happen to be a path that is somewhat dangerous, but saves more time.
attributes.name: High Priest

attributes.content: See that river heading underground? Jump down.
attributes.name: High Priest

attributes.content: For real?
attributes.name: Eunectes

attributes.content: The two of you should probably be fine, judging from your statures. But...
attributes.name: High Priest

attributes.content: You heard the man, Zumama. Get ready, and take a deep breathâ€“â€“
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: Let's go!
attributes.name: Eunectes

attributes.content: But, I would advise the two of you to just follow me slowly. The thing is... Huh? Where'd they go?
attributes.name: High Priest

attributes.content: In any case, this is the Durin city of Zeruertza.
attributes.name: Stitch Canvas

attributes.content: I had no idea there was a place like this beneath Acahualla...
attributes.name: Inam

attributes.content: Zeruertza has had its roots here since antiquity, but with the exception of a few adventurous idiots, we've generally had little interest in the surface world.
attributes.name: Stitch Canvas

attributes.content: Of course, I am an exception.
attributes.name: Stitch Canvas

attributes.content: You don't much care for stories of adventure?
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: That's right, I don't care for them at all.
attributes.name: Stitch Canvas

attributes.content: Stop trying to twist my words! I'm not an idiot either!
attributes.name: Stitch Canvas

attributes.content: That's not how I see it!
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: Ahem... Let me introduce myself once more. I am Stitch Canvas, the most distinguished architectural designer in the city.
attributes.name: Stitch Canvas

attributes.content: As you can see, the buildings around the city that speak most directly to one's heart and soul were designed by none other than myself!
attributes.name: Stitch Canvas

attributes.content: Like that big water slide over there? My respect for you is going through the roof, Mr. Stitch!
attributes.name: Tomimi

attributes.content: Uhh, no, that's not mine.
attributes.name: Stitch Canvas

attributes.content: You must've designed the dome above this underground city, then! It even simulates the feeling of sunlight. Incredible! Good going, kiddo, you're more than meets the eye!
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: Have you no aesthetic taste? Are you unable to grasp what truly matters about this city?
attributes.name: Stitch Canvas

attributes.content: Uhh... the greenery looks pretty nice?
attributes.name: Inam

attributes.content: Alright, we'll need to cultivate some appreciation in you.
attributes.name: Stitch Canvas

attributes.content: Since you'll never get another opportunity like this and I happen to have some time before my next job, I wouldn't mind showing you a place in this city that stands as the quintessence of wisdom.
attributes.name: Stitch Canvas

attributes.content: It is my temporary residence, personally designed to bear the core of my profound philosophy...
attributes.name: Stitch Canvas

attributes.content: Beholdâ€“â€“
attributes.name: Stitch Canvas

attributes.content: Inam, look! What kind of store is that?!
attributes.name: Tomimi

attributes.content: A swimsuit shop?
attributes.name: Inam

attributes.content: They're so cute!!
attributes.name: Tomimi

attributes.content: Durin clothes won't fit you. Not to mention your thick tail...
attributes.name: Inam

attributes.content: P-P-Please don't talk about my tail!
attributes.name: Tomimi

attributes.content: It can't hurt to take a look, right?
attributes.name: Tomimi

attributes.content: Hey, you two. Hey!!
attributes.name: Stitch Canvas

attributes.content: Elysium, we have to bring those two back...
attributes.name: Stitch Canvas

attributes.content: Thanks for your patronage~
attributes.name: Durin Hawker

attributes.content: Mmh, what an exotic flavor! These grilled mushrooms are as unique as you'd expect!
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: Kay's culinary tastes are top-class. If the mushrooms of Acahualla are not to be missed, the mushrooms beneath Acahualla are to die for! Care for a bite?
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: Don't you think you're assimilating way too easily?!
attributes.name: Stitch Canvas

attributes.content: Ugh, my head hurts...
attributes.name: Wobbly Durin

attributes.content: Hang in there, brother! Don't let these little setbacks get the better of you! All our suffering, all our hardship... It all meant something!
attributes.name: Absent-Minded Durin

attributes.content: The disease is taking me... The time we spent together was pure delight...
attributes.name: Wobbly Durin

attributes.content: There has to be some way, I'm sure of it...
attributes.name: Absent-Minded Durin

attributes.content: What about that mystical liquid? The miracle juice that supposedly restores anyone to health!
attributes.name: Absent-Minded Durin

attributes.content: Yeah, that's right... There's still the good stuff. It might even bring back my love of life...
attributes.name: Wobbly Durin

attributes.content: Help us out, kind-hearted passerby. Call out that magical name with us!
attributes.name: Absent-Minded Durin

attributes.content: You, with the thick tail over there, I'm talking to you!
attributes.name: Wobbly Durin

attributes.content: Eh? Me?
attributes.name: Tomimi

attributes.content: C'mon, dig into your heart, and shout the name with us. Three, two, one!
attributes.name: Absent-Minded Durin

attributes.content: Old Karl Mead!
attributes.name: Both Durins

attributes.content: Um... Gavial's stew?
attributes.name: Tomimi

attributes.content: Cut!
attributes.name: Absent-Minded Durin

attributes.content: You said the wrong line, Thick-Tail!
attributes.name: Wobbly Durin

attributes.content: P-Please don't call me that...
attributes.name: Tomimi

attributes.content: Where did Avdotya find such a strange woman...?
attributes.name: Absent-Minded Durin

attributes.content: Avdotya?
attributes.name: Tomimi

attributes.content: Hold on a sec... You aren't with Old Karl Mead's fan club!
attributes.name: Wobbly Durin

attributes.content: Avdotya's the only sober-looking person in the club!
attributes.name: Absent-Minded Durin

attributes.content: Wow, they actually use sobriety as their identifying standard...
attributes.name: Inam

attributes.content: What now, brother? Should we cancel our yodel-your-heart's-desires-out event?
attributes.name: Absent-Minded Durin

attributes.content: Not a chance!
attributes.name: Wobbly Durin

attributes.content: You're a Liberi who came here from the surface, aren't you? Fate brought us together today. Come, come. I still have another half-barrel of the good stuff.
attributes.name: Wobbly Durin

attributes.content: Inam, they actually carry around barrels of alcohol with them!
attributes.name: Tomimi

attributes.content: Where did they even get their hands on barrels that big?
attributes.name: Inam

attributes.content: This mead's the best stuff in all of Zeruertza! Though, there are always a few know-nothings out there who refuse to admit it.
attributes.name: Absent-Minded Durin

attributes.content: Wanna give it a shot, Liberi? You won't regret it.
attributes.name: Wobbly Durin

attributes.content: I have to hand it to you guys... You sure are enthusiastic.
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: All good, it's on us! One look at you, and we can tell you're...
attributes.name: Wobbly Durin

attributes.content: A gentleman of utmost distinction?
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: Not quite sober. Just the right type to become one of us!
attributes.name: Absent-Minded Durin

attributes.content: Are you saying I give off far out vibes? Hahaha, that's the first time anyone's said that about me. Never thought I'd be learning something new about myself here.
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: You can count me in then. Bottoms up!
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: How about the ladies over here? If you don't mind...
attributes.name: Wobbly Durin

attributes.content: Mm, I'd like a try as well.
attributes.name: Inam

attributes.content: J-Just a little bit then!
attributes.name: Tomimi

attributes.content: Wait, come back! Why are you drinking? We still have business to attend to!
attributes.name: Stitch Canvas

attributes.content: Huh? You're uh...
attributes.name: Wobbly Durin

attributes.content: Dear citizen, I know that confronting an important architectural designer such as myself might be a bit intimidating.
attributes.name: Stitch Canvas

attributes.content: But don't be fooled by the fact that these individuals appear idle. They actually have quite a bit of work to do, so if you'll please excuse us...
attributes.name: Stitch Canvas

attributes.content: Are you sure you don't want some, brother? This mead's seriously good stuff.
attributes.name: Absent-Minded Durin

attributes.content: Me? I'll pass, I don't drink.
attributes.name: Stitch Canvas

attributes.content: As one of the few Durins who needs his brain for problem-solving, I prefer to keep my head clear...
attributes.name: Stitch Canvas

attributes.content: ...Ugh.
attributes.name: Both Durins

attributes.content: Why are you looking at me like that? And why are you lifting those barrels up?
attributes.name: Stitch Canvas

attributes.content: Did you hear what he just said? My ears weren't playing tricks on me, right?
attributes.name: Wobbly Durin

attributes.content: This kid says he NEVER drinks? And supposedly to keep his head clear?
attributes.name: Absent-Minded Durin

attributes.content: We're in trouble, my friends. An alien has infiltrated our city!
attributes.name: Wobbly Durin

attributes.content: Open your eyes, you drunkards! They look more like aliens than anything else!
attributes.name: Stitch Canvas

attributes.content: It's time we let this fella know just how much nonsense he's spewing!
attributes.name: Absent-Minded Durin

attributes.content: 'Harder than ice, longer than winter. More silent than tears, more futile than sighs.'
attributes.name: Contemplative Lupo

attributes.content: 'Inova still cannot forget the afternoon she departed. The town was like a coughing giant, exhaling rust and spitting blood.'
attributes.name: Contemplative Lupo

attributes.content: 'She trips and falls, but climbs back to her feet. Her steps know no pause. She doesn't ask for muchâ€” she only wants to find a land without dreams, and a few moments to waste.'
attributes.name: Contemplative Lupo

attributes.content: 'Perhaps a cup of hot tea and a few sips of light liquor. Indulgence is not a sin, at least in her case.'
attributes.name: Contemplative Lupo

attributes.content: 'What... is she after, and what is she running from?'
attributes.name: Contemplative Lupo

attributes.content: 'Even she does not know the answers to these questions.'
attributes.name: Contemplative Lupo
